listitem.para: Outputs the file character position of the current read stream file as a number. An output value of 0 means that the read position is at the beginning of the stream.

listitem.programlisting:
OPENWRITE "dummy.fil SETWRITE "dummy.fil PRINT "Hello PRINT [Good Bye] SETWRITE [] CLOSE "dummy.fil
OPENREAD "dummy.fil SETREAD "dummy.fil REPEAT 2 [SHOW READPOS SHOW READLIST] 0 [Hello] 7 [Good Bye] SETREAD [] CLOSE "dummy.fil
